<Text: The Man Born to Be King is a radio drama based on the life of Jesus, produced and broadcast by the BBC during the Second World War.>

1: The Man Born to be King

Text: The Man Born to be King:  It is a play cycle consisting of twelve plays depicting specific periods in Jesus' life, from the events surrounding his birth to his death and resurrection.

2: The Man Born to be King
The Man Born to be King

--------------------
Text: The Man Born to be King:  It was first broadcast by the BBC Home Service on Sunday evenings, beginning on December 21, 1941, with new episodes broadcast at 4-week intervals, ending on October 18, 1942.
